title: LG 65-Inch OLED Smart TV
description: The LG 65-Inch OLED Smart TV provides a breathtaking viewing experience with its self-lighting OLED pixels that deliver perfect black and infinite contrast. This TV features 4K resolution and the α9 Gen 3 AI Processor 4K, which enhances picture and sound quality. The Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos bring cinema-quality visuals and sound to your home. This Smart TV supports NVIDIA G-SYNC for a smooth gaming experience and offers various gaming features like low input lag and fast response times. With webOS and ThinQ AI, you can easily access and navigate through your favorite streaming apps and control your smart home devices. The ultra-thin design of the LG OLED TV complements any home decor, and it comes with multiple HDMI and USB ports for versatile connectivity. Additionally, the TV features Filmmaker Mode, which preserves the original aspect ratios, colors, and frame rates, bringing the director's vision to your screen. It also has Sports Alert, which keeps you updated on your favorite teams and scores even while watching other content. The LG OLED TV's AI Acoustic Tuning adjusts the sound based on your room's acoustics, providing an immersive audio experience.
key_features: Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos
meta_title: LG 65-Inch OLED Smart TV - Perfect Black and Infinite Contrast
meta_description: Buy LG 65-Inch OLED Smart TV. Features 4K resolution, α9 Gen 3 AI Processor, Dolby Vision IQ, and Dolby Atmos. Ideal for cinematic viewing. Order now!

title: LG OLED C1 Series 4K Smart TV
description: The LG OLED C1 Series 4K Smart TV brings the ultimate entertainment experience with self-lit pixels that deliver perfect black, intense color, and infinite contrast. The a9 Gen4 AI Processor 4K enhances picture and sound with AI-based learning. Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos transform your home into a cinema, optimizing picture and sound quality based on the content and lighting in your room. The C1 series supports NVIDIA G-SYNC and FreeSync Premium, making it the perfect choice for gamers. Its slim design and Gallery Stand make it a stylish addition to any room. The webOS platform offers a user-friendly interface and access to your favorite streaming apps. With built-in Google Assistant and Alexa, you can control your TV and connected smart devices with your voice.
key_features: Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos
meta_title: LG OLED C1 Series 4K Smart TV - Perfect Black and Intense Color
meta_description: Experience ultimate entertainment with the LG OLED C1 Series 4K Smart TV. Features self-lit OLED pixels, a9 Gen4 AI Processor, Dolby Vision IQ, and Dolby Atmos for stunning picture and sound.
